articles.title: Bullish on 2 realty stocks; avoiding auto for next 2 quarters: Prasanth Prabhakaran
articles.description: It is not going to be easy getting the real estate sector out of the problem.
articles.content: It is preferable to avoid the four-wheeler space at least for the next two quarters while the two-wheeler segment is slightly better off, says Prasanth Prabhakaran, Jt MD & CEO, Yes Securities. Excerpts from an interview with ETNOW.How are you looking at … [+4521 chars]
